main event: Witnesses reported seeing a bright, near-circular object with blinking lights moving rapidly and silently over Robstown, Texas on 21 August 1968.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2 hours,The object exhibited rapid movements, including disappearing and reappearing in different locations,The object was described as having a brilliant white color and glowing edges without making any sound,Several witnesses expressed frustration with authorities when trying to report UFO sightings,The sightings correspond with earlier documented cases from October 1967 and March 1968.
sighted object: bright near-circular object with blinking lights
witness description: Average citizens with no prior experience in reporting such phenomena.
